page.title: 05YOXALL TRADE (continued)
page.content: In addition to those previously listed there are in the outlying areas the following _The Forester's Arms, a public house with restaurant and a Trout Farm on the banks of the Swarbourn,midway between the village and the pub. It has recently suffered the loss of its entire stock,due to suspected oxygen deficiency. The majority of businesses in Yoxall,excluding he public houses are in private hands. 1985 Price List at The Old Store Cooking Foil 22 pence Wall paper stripper 94 pence 10 fibre tip pens 27 pence galvanised buckets 159 pence brick hammers 337 pence blow lamps 455 pence broom head 59 pence metal polish 64 pence torch batteries from 10 pence
